title: John Coleman (rugby league)
text:
John Coleman (birth unknown) is an Irish professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer for the <a href="Sheffield%20Eagles">Sheffield Eagles</a> in the <a href="Co-operative%20Championship">Co-operative Championship</a>. He plays on the . He is an <a href="Ireland%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Ireland</a> international.
Background.
John Coleman was born in Ireland.
